messages.title: A proven track record of action on local issues
messages.content: Dorothy has a record of working tirelessly on local issues.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Dorothy will fight to secure the future of local hospitals and services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Helping with the cost of living
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans to more than double the £25 weekly cold weather payment to help with sky-high heating bills.
Committed to fighting for fairer funding for our local schools to help every child get the best start in life.
Has a record of helping local businesses to grow and create jobs.

issues.economy: Dorothy has a record of helping local businesses to grow and create jobs.
issues.education: Committed to fighting for fairer funding for our local schools.
issues.health: Dorothy will fight to secure the future of local hospitals and services.
issues.socialWelfare: Plans to more than double the £25 weekly cold weather payment to help with heating bills.
